"Xiandy": "Xitrae"
"Thank you for coming here. Allow me to introduce myself again."
"My name is Xiandy. I'm currently researching various phenomena that occur on Halpha."
"I called you here today is because recently, there've been sightings of a certain creature..."
"Thank you for coming here."
"This time I've called you here because recently, there've been sightings of a certain creature..."
"...I'm sorry? Oh, why do I look like this?"
"...W-Well, you see... I am currently dressed as the... life-form that I'm investigating."
"A certain someone told me \"in order to learn about your subject, you must first BECOME your subject\"... and then I was given this costume."
"I-It's... quite embarrassing, but I'm trying my best to wear it."
"...Anyways, the name of what we're investigating are called \"Lillipans\"."
"As their ecology hasn't yet been identified, we're not sure why they've appeared, nor where they ordinarily live."
"I was hoping to be able to call on your help to research this mysterious creature."
"First, could I ask you to travel to one of the locations one was last spotted?"
"Thank you very much."
"Great work! I really appreciate your help!"
"Now that we know about the situation with the Lillipans, I'll be able to finish writing my report!"
"...Heeey... While you're here, I've got another request for you, actually..."
"We've recently noticed some changes in Resol Forest's ecosystem as well. Strange plants seem to have started growing there..."
"Could you look into this for me as well?"
"Thank you very much, <%me>."
"With your help, I was able to collect data on the Lillipans."
"While the investigation only started recently, I think it's safe to say that they pose no threat."
"We will continue our investigations."
"I hope to be able to call on your help for future research endeavors."
"Thank you very much once again."
"Now then..."

"Well, just give it some thought. We'd really appreciate the help. Seeya!"

"With your help, I was able to collect data on the Lillipans."
"While the investigation only started recently, I think it's safe to say that they pose no threat."
"We will continue our investigations."
"I hope to be able to call on your help for future research endeavors."
